caption: Marketplace - Get Active Listings
doc: Get all the active listings on a given NFT marketplace.

AGe.caption: Marketplace Address
AGe.doc: The smart contract address of the NFT marketplace you are fetching the listings from.
AGe.name: marketplace_address

AGf.caption: NFT Contract Address
AGf.doc: Optional: You will only be returned the listed NFTs that were minted from the NFT smart contract.
AGf.name: nft_contract_address

AGg.caption: NFT Token ID
AGg.doc: Optional: You will only be returned the listed NFTs that were minted from the NFT smart contract provided and have this Token ID.
AGg.name: nft_token_id

AIE.caption: RPC URL
AIE.doc: Choose the network is the marketplace you are fetching information from is deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AIE.name: default_provider
